title: What Percentage Of State Lottery Money Goes To The State FiveThirtyEight » DataLab | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: John Oliver is not impressed by state lotteries. In a segment for his HBO show “Last Week Tonight” on Sunday, he described how they’re “sold to us as charitable foundations,” but he finds little evidence that the lotteries have any positive impact whatsoever on most Americans’ lives. In basic percentage terms, Oliver has a point: […]
